_sText:
A small and tight deathmatch map, themed in the Dust 2 style.

This is an incremented version of dm_dustbox.

Changes:
-------

* Optimized the map, added hints, fades, etc.
	- Made a lot of changes to what the game believes is visible from any one place, and hence what it draws
	- Map should now perform much more stably as the server population increases

* Add DD's on opposite sides of the map - Gives some nice additional gameplay

* Removed the dustclouds (performance)

* Extended / moved some walls inside (breaks centre up a bit, better performance)

* Changed the small breakaway doors to classic Dust door shape

* Added / moved several props, especially crates, to enable easier climbing

* Removed a member's name, added 2 other members' names

* Moved some names out of shadow

* Func-brushed name brushes, to make them non-solid

* Changed roof-dome props and moved palm-tree

* Raised sand-level near corner platform, to enable easy entry

* Added more cover on corner platform
